title: CBIC Announces ACES-GST Application Maintenance on Dec 7-8, 2025
content:
# CBIC Announces ACES-GST Application Maintenance on Dec 7-8, 2025

Ek important update hai. Directorate General of Systems, CBIC ne ACES-GST Application par ek planned maintenance activity announce ki hai.

Here are the key details:

*   **Maintenance Period:** The maintenance activity is scheduled from 20:00 Hours on 7th December 2025 (Sunday) to 01:00 Hours on 8th December 2025 (Monday).
*   **Impact on Services:** During this window, services related to Central Excise/Service Tax will not be available.
*   **Taxpayer Advisory:** All taxpayers are advised to plan their activities accordingly to avoid any inconvenience.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://cbic-gst.gov.in/)

*Published on: 8 December 2025*
